title: The Emerald Rainbow
description: In the fall of 1930, Sheldon Henry's life is in turmoil once again. As his second wife, Eliza, struggles with a life threatening illness, Sheldon fears that he may be left to raise his four young daughters alone.Thomasina, a beautiful young Irish woman, is also facing an uncertain future. Her husband of one month abandons her and she is forced to take on the role of a housekeeper for which she is ill prepared.How much tragedy can one man endure without completely losing hope?Can a woman whose life has been shattered learn to trust God?Can a man and woman from completely different backgrounds find love and forgiveness in a broken world?
author: Lynette Chambers
